(Update Terms of Service)
The amendment permits individuals to monetize video distribution by the following means (Article 10.3)
* YouTube: "YouTube Partner Program" (After November 13, 2020)
* Twitch: "Twitch Affiliate program" and "Twitch Partner Program" (After November 13, 2020)

(New feature: Private Board)
Aside from the leaderboard for all users, you can now create a private leaderboard (Private Board).
Private Boards can be created/entered from the leaderboard of a target game.
By creating a Private Board and sharing your room ID with viewers during a live broadcast, you can easily hold eSports tournaments and other events between the live broadcaster and viewers.
Just like regular leaderboards, Private Boards will have video replays and score registration, so you and your viewers can watch replays of the top scores during live broadcasts.
Private Boards can be used at no additional charge.
NOTE: This feature is only available for FREE PLAY titles.

(Other Enhancement)
* Add the option keep playing title BGM (MENU - Settings)
* Make free the score attack of the ZANAC
* Removed daily ranking from the Leaderboards
* Add the customize configurations of the virtual gamepad size & position
* Add the key-bind settings of physical gamepads
* Add FAQ in English

(Bugfix)
* BATTLE MARINE: fixed an issue where scores in the 10,000s were displayed as missing.
* ZANAC: fixed flickering due to the horizontal sprite over.
* HYDLIDE SPECIAL: fixed the position of the screen clip.
* Fixed an issue where multiple sound effects could be played when closing a dialog by tapping outside the window.

New Feature: Watch Video Ads and Play for Free

Some titles can now be played for free by watching the video ads.
Please note that when playing with video ads, you will not be able to challenge score attacks, etc., but will only be able to enjoy normal gameplay.
We have also updated the game list page (ALL) to make it easier to find free-to-play titles.
